\u00a9 ILP Innovations 2016
Please select the appropriate number of stars to understand your knowledge level before and after the training.
Please select the appropriate number of stars to indicate the level of acceptance with the following assertions, one being lowest and four being highest.
Please select the appropriate number of stars to indicate the overall performance of associate in the training.
Before the program
After the program
Knowledge about the topics covered in the program
Knowledge about importance of topics covered and its relevance to my job.
Practical know how to apply these aspects in my job.
Confidence to apply these aspects in my job.
Commitment to apply these aspects in my job.
Comments
The manner in which training was conducted helped me in my learning process.
I was actively engaged and involved throughout the program.
The information was presented in the logical and structured manner.
The knowledge, information and resources presented helped me in my learning.
The scope and content of the training was appropriate to meet my needs/job.
The examples presented helped me in understanding the content.
Was engaging and exciting.
The room was free of any distractions and conductive to learning.
The training would have a significant impact on: Increasing productivity and quality; Improving CSAT; Improving employee satisfaction and job performance.
Overall I rate the course as.
What about the course was most useful to you.
What about this class was least useful to you and what can we change to make it more revelant to your job?.
